info.title: Interactive Steem API
info.description:
Interactive Steem API. This UI lets you interact with Steem Blockchain and build a request/query, get output. By seeing examples of real live output, you will have ideas on how to start implementing new apps! 
 APIs have default parameters to get you started. API list is compiled from [Steem Github](https://github.com/steemit/steem). If you want to contribute documenting detail of properties and output, make a PR to [Github](https://github.com/esteemapp/steemapi) or contact [@good-karma](https://steem.chat/direct/good-karma). You can also check full list here [Steem-js](https://github.com/steemit/steem-js/tree/master/doc) and [DevPortal](https://developers.steem.io/apidefinitions/#apidefinitions-condenser-api).

get.description: Returns version information of connected Steem node/websocket.
Returns the market volume for the past 24 hours.
Returns the vesting delegations by an account. Parameters: delegator_account:string; start_account:string; limit:int up to 1000

parameters.name: delegator_account
parameters.description: Queries up to 10 vesting delegations by “steemit”.
